title: Intro to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming language and build a strong foundation in coding.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Master the art of designing and analyzing algorithms to solve complex problems efficiently.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Explore C++ programming in-depth and its applications in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA).

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Dive into the world of data structures and learn how to efficiently store and manipulate data.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles using Python for real-world applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: Learn the principles and practices of software engineering to build reliable and scalable software systems.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Master Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing to deploy and manage applications at scale.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Learn the ins and outs of MySQL database management and query optimization for efficient data handling.

title: Problem-Solving Part I
description: Hone your problem-solving skills through a variety of challenging exercises and real-world scenarios.
